name: TreeHugger.exe
description:
Summary:

TreeHugger.exe is a program that never seems the same when you play it. You can insert the disk and you get a different game each time you play it. How you may ask? Who knows? All we know is what seems to be on the surface.

This game is a sequel to "CollinsNightmare.exe" a game about a boy named Collin who nobody truly knows. This game goes more in-depth of who Collin is...or was. Maybe you can crack the code. It ain't easy after all.

Controls:

WASD - Move

Shift - Run

Mouse - Point flashlight/Menu

Credits:

SeventyFour Productions - Programming / Graphics / Writing / Story

GamingGreen - Graphics / Writing / Story / Bug-testing / Voice-acting

Bro. Three - Music / Bug-testing / Voice-acting
